stages.title: Foundation
stages.description: In the next two quarters, I plan to work on strengthening my programming skills. Further, I want to complete RankNSFLinker and Triage, focus on solving the DevOps/DevSecOps scenarios, and read about developing more in-depth skills about technologies like ElasticSearch/Postgres/Redis/PebbleDb/Kafka
goals: 1 LeetCode + 1 CodeForces problem day = 360 problems by end of the two quarters
Get a starting grip on Rust, good integration skills, visualisation skills for triage
Work on that dream project, RankNSFLinker, to finally show my depth of thinking
Deep data retrieval and storage policies and ideas
Acknowledge and implement deep, advanced data structure technigues and algorithmic implementation

milestones.name: Basic to advanced data engineering reading

stages.title: Personal Growth
stages.description: Starting from this quarter, I will and need to improve my social networking skills. I intend to send out more emails, more messages, more approaches, more focus on attending events, and more focus on taking out focused time to generate new plausible ideas seeing problems around me
goals: Send at least 5 emails to professor, professionals. Try similar habits.
